title: Pokémon GO Compatible Devices & PGSharp Updates
overview_intro_text: Discover compatible devices, curated PGSharp updates, and quick tools to keep your trainers informed.
overview_devices_desc: Explore phones and tablets, filter by type, and open the modal to see details and notes.
overview_news_cta: Stay up to date with PGSharp news
overview_news_desc: Read curated PGSharp announcements, feature updates, and community alerts in the News tab.
devices_section_intro: Filter the catalog, inspect device notes, and copy ready-to-use entries for your dataset.
news_section_intro: Latest PGSharp releases, feature announcements, and community alerts.
impressum_note: This site provides informational content only. We do not host or provide instructions for spoofing tools.
about_pgsharp_paragraph: PGSharp is a third-party location-spoofing tool for Pokémon GO. Using such tools likely violates Niantic's Terms of Service and may result in account suspension. This page contains informational content only — we do not provide usage guides, assistance to evade detection, or host downloads.
cookie_question: We use cookies for analytics and ads. Do you accept?
device_builder_intro: Fill out the fields to generate a JSON snippet ready to paste into data/devices.json.
device_builder_result_hint: Copy the JSON snippet into data/devices.json.
device_builder_empty: Fill in the form to generate JSON.
pgsharp_status_not_compatible: Not compatible / Waiting for PGSharp update
legal_pokemon: Pokemon is a trademark of Niantic
legal_brands: All brands are property of their owners
pgsharp_faq_a1: PGSharp is a third-party app that provides location controls and convenience features for Pokémon GO on Android devices. This page contains informational descriptions only.
pgsharp_faq_q2: Is it safe to use PGSharp?
pgsharp_faq_a2: Using third-party tools can violate Niantic's Terms of Service and may pose account risk. PoGoSDex only provides informational summaries and does not host or endorse bypassing protections.
pgsharp_faq_a3: Refer to the official PGSharp website or their knowledge base for installation steps and official guidance.
pgsharp_faq_a4: PGSharp publishes updates through official channels. Always prefer official release notes and vendor guidance when updating.
pgsharp_faq_a5: Custom Shortcuts let users save frequently used locations or actions for quick access inside the app. They are intended for convenience and quick navigation.
pgsharp_faq_q6: Where can I find more help?
pgsharp_faq_a6: See the official PGSharp knowledge base and feature pages linked on this page for authoritative help and supported features.
pgsharp_features_f1_desc: A virtual on-screen joystick that allows small, smooth movements for short-distance navigation.
pgsharp_features_f2_desc: Jump to a selected location on the map for quick checks of distant spots.
pgsharp_features_f3_desc: Automatically follow a predefined route at configurable speed; useful for longer movements when supported.
pgsharp_features_f4_desc: Save frequently used locations or actions as shortcuts for one‑tap access inside the app.
pgsharp_features_f5_desc: Helpers such as bookmarks, location history and quick links that make the app easier to use.
privacy_intro: This page informs you of the policies of pogosdex.com ("the Site", "us", "we", or "our") regarding the collection, use and disclosure of Personal Information we receive from users of the Site.
privacy_usage: We use your Personal Information only for providing and improving the Site. By using the Site, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
privacy_collection_text: We may use third-party advertising companies to serve ads when you visit the Site. These companies may use aggregated information (not including your name, address, email address or telephone number) about your visits to this and other Web sites in order to provide advertisements about goods and services of interest to you. If you would like more information about this practice and to know your choices about not having this information used by these companies, click here.
privacy_logdata_text: This site uses Google Analytics, a cookie-based technology for measuring website traffic. Google Analytics does not store any PII (personally identifiable information) and presents data in aggregate, not individual user activity. If you would like to opt out of Google Analytics, see here.
privacy_cookies_text: We use cookies to store information for your convenience ("Settings"). We also may use third party advertisements on the Site. Some of these advertisers may use technology such as cookies and web beacons when they advertise on the Site, which will also send these advertisers (such as Google through the Google AdSense program) information including your IP address, your ISP, the browser you used to visit our site, and in some cases, whether you have Flash installed. This is generally used for geotargeting purposes (showing New York real estate ads to someone in New York, for example) or showing certain ads based on specific sites visited (such as showing cooking ads to someone who frequents cooking sites).
privacy_cookies_disable: You can choose to disable or selectively turn off our cookies or third-party cookies in your browser settings, or by managing preferences in programs such as Norton Internet Security. However, this can greatly affect how you are able to interact with the Site as well as most other websites.
privacy_security_text: The security of your Personal Information is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacy_changes_text: We reserve the right to update or change our Privacy Policy at any time and you should check this Privacy Policy periodically. Your continued use of the Service after we post any modifications to the Privacy Policy on this page will constitute your acknowledgment of the modifications and your consent to abide and be bound by the modified Privacy Policy.
privacy_contact_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@pogosdex.com.
pgsharp_report_local_success: Thanks — your message was processed locally.
